sense.name: Replicate or repeat an action.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Thing duplicated must be an action [+abstract]
sense.examples: He could never duplicate his brilliant performance of the magic trick. The company duplicated the research. The disorder was duplicated in mice last year.

sense.name: Make a physical copy of or the illusion of a physical copy of something.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Thing duplicated must be an object [+concrete]
sense.examples: Could you please duplicate this letter for me? The forger duplicated the painting exactly.
